header.activity: Two colleagues having a chat during lunchtime break.

yeah so but it's a much better place now isn't it? The park?
I haven't been there I haven't been there so I don't know but I should imagine they've done a lot yeah

me neither cos we were just thinking uh over the weekend cos it's Mothering Sunday uh I was probably just thinking about like doing a takeaway or something cos we don't really know any pubs in this area eh we've only been here for a year and my in-laws have only just literally moved to so you know
so you will you if you would you go out for something to eat then if it if you knew a few places that were places you might like to go?
if we knew beforehand then yeah but the trouble is
yeah
it's all going to be absolutely booked up because it's Mothering Sunday
that's true that's true It is all booked up isn't it really? The only place I could think of that might not be is do you know do you know the um ?
yeah it's uh I've never been there but I know about the place
Cos they're always I mean to me they seem they're hunting customers really

so that might be somewhere to go I might pop along there so it's this Sunday isn't it?
I think so yeah
yeah

yeah my son made me a card at playgroup eh well I'm saying he made it he just stuck some kind of you know stickers and that cos it was already made you know but still it was quite sweet really you know
that was really sweet
yeah he made it yesterday with when he went to the mother and toddler group with my mother-in-law so it was quite cute
my daughter made you know she'd made she got she thought it was last Sunday
mm hm

so she thought Mother's Day was last Sunday so I woke up on Sunday to find this card all made for me and she had inside the card she had made these like mock envelope and in the envelope were these tokens three three no five tokens three cleaning tokens and two she does nail varnish so she's going to do my nails
ah that's quite sweet really yeah
that's really sweet isn't it? So she hasn't been to the shops or anything she just got these little tokens so I have to make use of that this weekend to do my work for me
oh I look forward to the time when my son can give me tokens for hoovering and cleaning if it ever happens I don't think it will though
so how old is your kid?
well his uh a twenty-one month old so
oh yeah
he's quite small yeah he's gonna be two in June
so the hoover is probably still quite interesting
oh yeah he's fascinated by it absolutely yeah
fascinated
just every time I hoover he just you know he just wants to grab it and just do it all himself maybe I should buy him a toy one or something

I remember that I remember my son used to he was so interested in the hoover he also used to pull it out all the time pull it out of the plug and um and then it's kind of changed you know the hoover goes on it's like shut up I want to watch the TV I want to watch the TV
how do things change? Yeah it was quite concerning actually cos we usually take him to Early Learning Centre or something like that and just let him you know choose whatever toys he wants
yeah
just to see what he would play with naturally
mm

and sadly so far it's always been cleaning equipment is there some sort of toy set for like cleaners there was I was sort of you know this cleaning trolley with like you know sort of you know brushes and that sort of thing
mm
he seems to enjoy playing with that
so you just take him somewhere and just let him nat just see what he would choose
just out of interest really we don't necessarily buy it for him but you know just just to see what he would be interested in you know
that's that's good cos my son was pretty similar he liked cleaning things things that do something
yeah
like a hoover or a brush or a s anything that was to do something
yeah it's copying adults as well isn't it?
yeah
it's like if you if he watches adults doing something he wants to do the same thing you know
I seem to remember tool kits as well
oh yeah
he loved tool kits
yeah we tried to hide the one that's uh uses
does he try and get in it? Does he try?
yeah very much so
have you tried buying him little plastic tools and things but they're just not the same are they? They want the real thing

he knows He knows they're not real so he wants to play with the actual grown-up toys and obviously the the iPhones and iPads and things like this you know he just loves it yeah he keeps playing with ' iPhone because there's you know this program with all the animal voices he loves it um like just like just a little app thing you know
yeah
and the same on the iPad as well it's got different apps for like you know piano and you know drums that sort of thing
I bet he's just so he that age it's quite it's quite intense isn't it? It's quite full on
yeah so yeah it's a shame really that I don't get to see it you know fully because you know he's like with a childminder some days and with my mother-in-law other days yeah
but it does give you that break as well doesn't it?
uh if you call it a break It's work
mental difference isn't it? It's just a men it's a break in terms of you're not doing I always find doing the same thing all the time is quite hard
I think so
even though it's something you enjoy I mean like spending time with your son is is enjoyable
yeah
but doing that all the time can get a bit too intense
hmm
like when I was lit when the kids were little
well maybe
I was really keen to to just mix and match up my life a bit as well so that um I had that adult time as well as being with them and
yeah I don't know the way I feel now I just really want to go to you know uh play groups with him and do activities and things and I've I never get to do it
hmm
you see?
oh yeah see that's that's something that you it is a good good times aren't they? The good times
yeah definitely but then you know I wish I could sort of you know maybe go part time or something like that but it's not the right job to go part timing sadly
it isn't really is it?
no well

no but it's because it's a day in day out job isn't it really? It's not gonna that's what I like about mine I've got three days and I can I see my way through three days but by Friday I feel like I've done you know I feel like I've done a full a week really
yeah
and also at the moment it's been very full-on cos we've been looking for new staff but luckily we've got two new staff starting so yeah you should have an easier time
yeah brilliant yeah I didn't know that they were going to appoint like two people cos I thought it was just one

me too I thought there was just one as well but um there were two starting at the same time I think it is good in some way two starting at the same time means they get all the training out the way um we've got Easter coming up then after Easter it will be you know we're working as a team then it will be good because it's been me and Sam Thursdays and Fridays
hmm
and they hardly take any new supply in on now
yeah well supply are expensive aren't they really?
yeah
yeah my husband was actually thinking about doing supply cos he's on a temporary contract at the moment
hmm
eh he's a primary school teacher
hmm
and what he did when we first moved into this area from is that he took like a long-term supply for about eight weeks or something uh in a school in and I think he really enjoyed it actually
hmm
so he wouldn't mind doing some more supply cos he's um he's temporary now and he's got another temporary one uh starting from Easter as well
hmm

he'd love it to become permanent but if it doesn't he would be quite happy to just uh do supply or something you know actually he really enjoyed that um that first supply he did in because on the third day of him working there he actually saw the Queen in the the Gardens
hmm did he? How come? Was she just there on a visit? Just
I think there was some sort of new building and you know she just opened that new building or something
she was just there for yeah
yeah he said she looked exactly the same as she normally looks like on the photos and that
she incredible I find cos she's a very I mean she m I'm not quite sure how old she is but she's you know she's she's quite an old lady really
yeah
and she always looks very um fit and um well you know her she looks really great really I think
well I think she's doing brilliant yeah
mm the same with me I went to Abbey I haven't been to Abbey for years and years
right
and years and I said uh I'm going to meet my friend there why don't we go there? So we went there I said oh the car park's quite full you know it not usually like this on a weekday
yeah
and it seemed to be all the sort of plant pots on the outside and it was all looking lovely and Prince Charles was there
amazing I actually live next to Abbey cos I live in
yeah
and we just walk there you know it's brilliant
it's lovely isn't it?
yeah they're building a new car park there as well
they're extending it a lot aren't they?
yeah
and um I in the last couple of years it's got really popular I think there was you know the snowdrop season?
yeah of course yeah that's
it became a national thing because in the papers it was there at a time every paper was talking about the snowdrops at Abbey
yeah

and how many different varieties of snowdrop there are and did you know that there are this type and that type and and then from that point when it became like this public thing all these cars turn up at the weekend they must be doing really well
I think so
they've extended their um cafeteria as well haven't they?
they did yeah
yeah
yeah they do photo walks and all sort you know when it's the snowdrop snow drop season
yeah
you know so yeah it's quite popular
I've never been on I've just been on the walks or have I? I haven't been on a guided walk or anything like that but I've been around the gardens
well you don't really to you just kind of have to go and explore at your own leisure really you know?
yeah
my husband normally just um takes my son on Sunday you know and goes to Abbey with him you know to just give me a bit of a break really you know? So it's nice
what a nice place to live though just down there
yeah
just down on your doorstep isn't it?

yeah so you can just you can you can the whole village is
yeah

and as well yeah

they live well it would be a f a door away from where lives um
oh in one of the big houses?
yeah

oh I didn't know lived there are well
yeah
I've not seen her around there

cats meet up don't they the cats?
they do yeah
they've got their own thing going on
yeah
you just don't
yeah there's a like in the car park next to my house there's always like a cat party every every evening that sort of thing

we have a cat we our our cat and she doesn't particularly like going out to the front so she's not really on the road at all and she's not on the front garden but the cat across the road this big lovely black cat and she or he comes over to try and it seems to me try and uh get our cat to come out and you know join in
yeah

and have some fun and well our cat she's called she sits in the window just sort of like looking like this saying oh here she comes again not bothered and it's a cat thing but obviously waiting like almost like a friend you know like when you were a kid
yeah

and your friends come over and knock knock for you to come and play and she's not having it she just doesn't you know she's so disinterested and this poor little black cat or big black cat comes over every day with you know
wow
wanting to have some fun I'm a bit worried though because um she has to cross the road each time and I think one day she's not gonna make the right decision and you know the
well cats are clever
they're very clever
yeah
they are clever
we're quite lucky in this respect because we haven't got any major roads or anything next to our house
yeah

did she?
it was horrible I hate mice I absolutely hate mice
actually I don't mind them really
really?

no I don't mind them I might not particularly want to have them regularly or anything but I don't mind mice I feel all really sad when our cat gets one cos she just she brings them in and she shows us it's a big deal you know like come and look at this mouse I've killed for you and
wow
to go through the wow wow you've brought a mouse in but um no I don't know it's a bit sad really and you'll try and hide them and then she'll go and find them again
wow I'll call you the next time she brings in a mouse I hate mice
yeah I honestly don't mind them don't mind them
yeah

yeah that's fine okay
